episodes.title: You Can Never Pause at the Perfect Time
episodes.plot: Time has stopped except Yorozuya. It seems to be related that Gintoki damaged "the universe clock" what he found at the sight of the UFO clashing last night.

episodes.title: Even a Matsui Stick Can't Handle Some Kinds of Dirt
episodes.plot: Yorozuya comes to realize that the universe clock ran out of battery. They head to crash site to search a spare battery.

episodes.title: An Inspector's Love Begins with an Inspection
episodes.plot: Gintama is being spied upon by a inspector who falls in love with Gintama's maid Tama San and drama ensues.

episodes.title: Forget Dates, Remember People/You Can Hide Your Porn Mags But You Can't Hide Your ***
episodes.plot: Seita learns history from Tsukuyo. He wants Gintoki to be his tutor because her way of teaching is too strict. / Due to his strict parents, Takachin asked Shinpachi to hold on his manga. Shinpachi is worried about if he can hide them from his sister Tae.

episodes.title: A Mirror Provides a Frozen Reflection of Both Your Beautiful and Ugly Sides/Nobody Likes the Photo on Their License
episodes.plot: One day, a new large mirror places in the washroom in Yorozuya office without notice. / Yamazaki thinks to try something to step up in his career. Then, he sees a Ninja license that Zenzou has, he wants to get it.

episodes.title: Arriving Late to a Reunion Makes It Hard to Enter
episodes.plot: Gintoki is invited a reunion for big-four of Joi samurais. The organizer is Tasuke Kurokono, not Katsura or Sakamoto. But, somehow nobody remembers him.

episodes.title: A Reunion also Brings to the Surface Things You Don't Want to Remember
episodes.plot: Gintoki, Katsura and Sakamoto begin to remember Kurokono after reading a letter from Takasugi.

episodes.title: When Compared to Time in the Heavens, Fifty Years of Human Life Resembles Naught But Dreams and Lottery Tickets
episodes.plot: Hijikata got a lottery ticket from a female shopkeeper of his favorite tobacco shop. And then, he feels that everyone is aiming at his money since he won the lottery.

episodes.title: Guys with Big Nostrils also Have Big Imaginations/You Never Accept a New Sentai Series at the Start, But by the Final Episode, You Don't Want It to End
episodes.plot: Gintoki realizes that Yorozuya has a little request for work recently because there is a lack of advertisements. He, Shinpachi and Kagura bounce ideas off each other to create publicity posters.

episodes.title: 9 + 1 = Yagyu Jyubei
episodes.plot: Kyubei sets off a chain of events where everyone swaps genders.

episodes.title: Calories Come Back to Bite You Just When You've Forgotten About Them
episodes.plot: The gang deals with their new issues as man and woman while trying to fix things.
Everyone has to adjust to living with their genders swapped. Jyubei feels guilty over what happened, but he gets a chance at redemption.

episodes.title: All Mothers Pack Too Much Food Into a Lunch Box and Ruin the Shape
episodes.plot: Seita doesn't eat lunch with classmates because he is embarrass by a feast in lunch box that Hinowa made every day. Tsukuyo notices it, and tries to break this situation.

episodes.title: The Reaper by Day and the Reaper by Night
episodes.plot: A serial killer called the Reaper has been targeting drunkards on the streets in Kabuki-Cho. One night, a drunk Gintoki encounters a girl who calls herself the Reaper. She asks him to help her to commit hara-kiri.

episodes.title: Human or Demon?
episodes.plot: The present head of a family of the executioner, Yaemon Ikeda reveals Gintoki's past just after Joi war.

episodes.title: Farewell, Reaper
episodes.plot: Asaemon points her sword at Yaemon with a will of her own, and she has a hard fight by overwhelming his force. Gintoki takes sides with Asaemon who fights back.

episodes.title: A Phoenix Rises from the Ashes Over and Over
episodes.plot: Hasegawa is making a living telling scary stories, and he comes to the Yorozuya for advice on how to make scary stories.

episodes.title: Amen
episodes.plot: Tama has become a confessional for people to relieve themselves of sin through confessing to her. Gintoki tries to make money by hiring Tama for his services, but hears too many dark secrets to his comfort.

episodes.title: Being a Leader Is Tough
episodes.plot: The Shogun has lost his memory and befriends Katsura and his rebels, but he's so reliable and noble that all the rebels switch to him as leader.

episodes.title: Love Is a Roach Motel
episodes.plot: There is a summer night festival in Kabuki-Chou. By way of getting back at Tae for rejecting him, Kondou strictly controls some dating couples to find faults with their behavior as he works. When he begins to feel the futility, she appears at the festival.

episodes.title: A Sizzle Summer/A Nothing Summer, 2015
episodes.plot: Yorozuya enjoys Suikawari with Soyo. / In the end of the summer vacation, Seita begs Yorozuya to help because he has not started a lot of his homework yet.

episodes.title: He's the Sweet Tooth, and I'm the Mayo Guy
episodes.plot: An accident causes Gintoki and Hijikata to switch bodies. They end up changing their respective groups for the better, or worse?

episodes.title: I'm a Failure as a Leader and He's also a Failure as a Leader
episodes.plot: A chance to return to normal is derailed when part of Gintoki's soul possesses a dead cat, turning it into a superhuman freak.

episodes.title: I'm Odd Jobs, and He's Shinsengumi
episodes.plot: Everybody's souls gets scrambled as Gintoki and Hijikata face off with the cat monster to return to normal.

episodes.title: Always Leave Enough Room for Fifty Million in Your Bag
episodes.plot: Whn Gintoki's friend Tatsuma Sakamoto is kidnapped, his lieutenant Mutsu enlists Gintoki to save him.

episodes.title: Always Leave Enough Room for Pebbles in Your Bag
episodes.plot: Mutsu and Gintoki go on the offensive to rescue Sakamoto.

episodes.title: Style Goes Out of Fashion the Moment It's Put Into Words/There Are Two Types of People in This World: Those Who Yell Out Their Attack Names, and Those Who Don't
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya decide to try a change in clothes. / Shinpachi tries to learn the secret technique his father left behind.

episodes.title: The Two Apes
episodes.plot: Kondo tracks down the Ape Boy, a thief from his past.

episodes.title: Afros of Life and Death
episodes.plot: Katsura infiltrates the Shinsengumi as a prolific Afro-wearing swordsman. This attracts the attention of another Afro-wearing Shinsengumi officer, the silent warrior Saito Shimaru.

episodes.title: Afuro and Wolfro
episodes.plot: When Katsura causes Saito to be put on trial, it's up to the Yorozuya to save him.

episodes.title: Take the Initial Premise Lightly, and It'll Cost You
episodes.plot: Kagura is in the hospital for a slight cold and tries to milk the situation for sympathy, but everyone thinks she is dying.

episodes.title: Keep Your Farewells Short
episodes.plot: A funeral is held for the still-living Kagura. Can she tell people she's alive before they cremate her?

episodes.title: One Editor Is Enough/The G-Pen Is Capricious, and the Maru Pen Is Stubborn
episodes.plot: Shachi loves a doctor in the prison's dispensary. He shows her his manga that expressing his love for her. / It was decided that Musai Akurogi will make their professional debut. Gintoki gets some dangerous prisoners as their assistants.

episodes.title: Strike When the Sword and Overlord Are Hot/Oil Rain
episodes.plot: Tetsuko asks Yorozuya to watch her sword-smith shop. / Tama gets to know a rickety vending machine named Tabako.

episodes.title: Shoguns of Light and Shadow
episodes.plot: The shogun's assassination is set in motion.

episodes.title: Ninja Village
episodes.plot: The Yorozuya discovers the Ninja Village, the Kihetai start their ambush and Okita confronts Kamui in a battle.

episodes.title: Ninja Soul
episodes.plot: Gintoki and his company arrived in a village of Ninja, and they learn Zenzou's secret plan. It's revealed Shigeshige and Zenzou's past.

episodes.title: And Then There Were Five
episodes.plot: Only Gintoki, Kagura, Shinpachi, Kondo, and Hijikata remain to protect the shogun.

episodes.title: Those Who Protect Against All Odds
episodes.plot: Gintoki takes on Takasugi. Meanwhile Kagura takes on Kamui.

episodes.title: Sworn Enemy
episodes.plot: Gintoki and Takasugi remember when they were boys with Shoyo while they fight a duel.

episodes.title: The Crows Caw After the Battle Ends
episodes.plot: Oboro intervenes in the battle between Gintoki and Takasugi. Meanwhile, it's an unexpected person that is waiting for Shinpachi and his company who escaped from the jaws of death.

episodes.title: Farewell, Buddy
episodes.plot: Shigeshige makes plans for his country's future, and leaves with a promise to see his friends again. A promise he will not survive to keep.

episodes.title: The Day the Demon Cried
episodes.plot: The war is over. Everyone is in the depths of despair. Kondou talks over a cup of sake with Gintoki in Shinsengumi headquarters, and then he appears at Mimawarigumi to be on death penalty.

episodes.title: Heroes Always Arrive Fashionably Late
episodes.plot: Hijikata has been feeling very depressed after Shinsengumi was dissolved. Kozenigata takes him and Gintoki to the bar where Tae works. Unfortunately, Nobunobu comes while they are drinking in the bar.

episodes.title: Lost and Found
episodes.plot: Kondou meets Katsura again in prison. Katsura proposes that Shinsengumi joins hands with his Joi party, and fight together to change this country.

episodes.title: Prison Break
episodes.plot: Shinsengumi under Hijikata and Katsura's Joi party head to Kokujo island where Kondou and Katsura have been captured.

episodes.title: Stray Dogs
episodes.plot: Yorozuya with Tae and Shinsengumi and Katsura's Joi party arrived together at Kokujo island. They start Kondou and Katsura rescue operation.

episodes.title: Undelivered Mail
episodes.plot: All thoughts are entangled in the fierce battle. The Shinsengumi's and the Mimawarigumi's pasts are revealed while Isaburo lets out his true intentions.

episodes.title: Karma
episodes.plot: Isaburo continues his plan of rebellion while the alliance retreats from the island. However, things come to a head, as death itself descends upon the battlefield.

episodes.title: Nobume
episodes.plot: While everyone fights to regroup and escape, Isaburo reaches an epiphany.

episodes.title: Farewell Shinsengumi
episodes.plot: Now wanted fugitives, the Shinsengumi say their goodbyes to their friends in Edo.
